attributes.action: anybody from anywhere can get a benefit in the UK?
attributes.additional_details: I've just watched benefits Britain on channel 5 how can the government let anybody come into this historic country where people have fought and died in wars, not work for months and then claim benefits from people who work everyday long hard hours from this country, steal and live in accommodation? When people from Britain are struggling each and every day? How can this be? New reforms in place, make Britain, Britains again.
